About Pango
Established in 2000, Shenzhen Pango Medical Electronics Co., Ltd. is specialized in developing and manufacturing medical devices, such as electronic blood pressure monitor, infrared thermometer, nebulizer, deaf-aid etc.With more than 10,000 square meters of factory and warehouse, Pango has integrated production chain which includes SMT workshop, molding, plastic injection, oil spaying, silk screen printing, and assembly line. Pango has passed the ISO 13485 international quality management system and our products have been approved by CE, RoHS, FDA and at the name list of Medical Devices and supplies companies with certification/Authorization from other countries. We are popular in North America, Europe, South-east Asia, Australia and the Middle Eas. Our mission is to improve the quality of human health through hi-tech health products.

Quality Guarantee

In addition, our factory have equipped with professional testing machines, including high-low temperature alternating, salt spray test chamber. simulate transport test device etc.

News
Learn more about Pangao and pay attention to industry trends
MEDICA 2023
Shenzhen Pango Medical Electronics Co., Ltd., a leading company dedicated to the development and manufacturing of healthcare electronics, is excited to announce its participation in the upcoming MEDICA 2023 exhibition in Germany. The company will present its cutting-edge medical devices, including blood pressure monitors and massage products, at the event. MEDICA 2023 will take place from November 13 to 16 at Stockumer Kirchstrasse 61, Dusseldorf, Germany, and Pango Medical Electronics can be found at Booth 17E03-1.
Essential Tips to Prevent Digital Eye Strain
In today's digital age, we spend more time than ever before in front of screens, be it computers, smartphones, or tablets. While technology has undoubtedly improved our lives in many ways, it has also given rise to a common ailment known as digital eye strain, or computer vision syndrome. The discomfort and fatigue that come with staring at screens for extended periods can take a toll on our eye health and overall well-being. Fortunately, there are practical steps you can take to prevent and alleviate digital eye strain. In this comprehensive guide, we will delve into these strategies in detail to help you maintain healthy eyes and make your digital interactions more comfortable.
Effective Ways to Relieve Low Back Pain
Low back pain is a common problem that can be caused by a variety of factors, including injury, stress, and poor posture. It can affect people of all ages and can be quite debilitating. There are several methods that can help to relieve low back pain.
The Therapeutic Potential of Knee Massagers for Osteoarthritis Pain Relief
Osteoarthritis (OA) is a prevalent joint disorder that affects millions of people worldwide, with the knee being one of the most commonly affected areas. Individuals living with osteoarthritis often experience pain, stiffness, and reduced mobility, greatly impacting their quality of life. While there are various treatment options available, using a knee massager has emerged as a promising non-invasive therapy to alleviate OA-related knee pain. Here's a more detailed discussion on the benefits of knee massagers for individuals with osteoarthritis-related knee pain:
Do Neck Massager Really Work?
In daily work, the high intensity of work pressure make people "keep their heads down", a long time of sedentary work with incorrect posture makes the neck their uncomfortable a common phenomenon. In addition, universal use of mobile phones makes people everywhere bow their heads. Cervical spondylosis has also become a common disease among young people. The neck massager emerged as the times require. Is it really useful?
Mercury Thermometer Will Stop Production, What Will Be Used for Temperature Measurement in the Future
On October 14, 2020, the State Food and Drug Administration of China announced that from January 1, 2026, the production of mercury
thermometers and mercury blood pressure monitor will be completely prohibited. Mercury thermometer is cheap and easy to use, almost every household must have it. The reason why it will withdraw from the market is that the mercury is harmful to health and the environment.
Notices for Measuring Blood Pressure with Digital BP Monitor
Nowadays, with the development of digital blood pressure monitor production technology, many people are willing to buy a blood pressure monitor at home to monitor blood pressure by themselves. In addition to buy a certificated electronic blood pressure monitor, measuring according to the product manual, and paying attention to what preparations should be made before blood pressure measurement, we should also notice the following issues.

results.title: Tech giants Alibaba, ByteDance lead China's return to CES
results.content:
“We like to make the case that the four days you spend in Las Vegas is some of the most efficient use of your time in the sense that you don’t have to necessarily travel the world to meet with individual business partners on six different continents,” said Kelley. Chinese tech giants Alibaba, ByteDance lead China’s return to premier consumer electronics show in Las Vegas
TikTok eyes US$17.5 billion shopping business on Amazon’s turf
“You have big exhibitors coming back, really showcasing that this is a platform that really pushes for consumers and enterprises and maybe [can] combat some of these major challenges that we’re facing,” Brian Comiskey, director of consumer programmes at the CTA, said after his opening remarks on Sunday afternoon.
 “Some of the largest Chinese companies that have signed up for participation this year … will all have a large presence at the show,” John Kelley, vice-president and show director for CES at the Consumer Technology Association (CTA), told the Post in an interview on November 29. This marks a stark reversal from 2023, when China had just started to reopen its borders but restrictions did not fall fast enough for many companies to make it to the show in the first week of January.
 Govee, a smart lighting maker from Shenzhen, is advertising the use of generative AI to help people create specific moods, like asking for a backdrop that is evocative of the Hong Kong skyline or Barbie Dreamhouse.
results.raw_content:
CES 2024: Chinese tech giants Alibaba, ByteDance lead China’s return to premier consumer electronics show in Las Vegas
TikTok eyes US$17.5 billion shopping business on Amazon’s turf
“You have big exhibitors coming back, really showcasing that this is a platform that really pushes for consumers and enterprises and maybe [can] combat some of these major challenges that we’re facing,” Brian Comiskey, director of consumer programmes at the CTA, said after his opening remarks on Sunday afternoon.
This marks a stark reversal from 2023, when China had just started to reopen its borders but restrictions did not fall fast enough for many companies to make it to the show in the first week of January.
“Some of the largest Chinese companies that have signed up for participation this year … will all have a large presence at the show,” John Kelley, vice-president and show director for CES at the Consumer Technology Association (CTA), told the Post in an interview on November 29. “But where we’re really seeing growth on the Chinese side is smaller companies.”
Kelley said the CTA was anticipating numbers to reach pre-Covid levels, and it looks like the show has pulled it off. The number of Chinese companies is more than the 1,000 that state-run tabloid Global Times reported for the 2020 show. CTA said the show has attracted around 4,000 exhibitors, although numbers are not final yet. Kelley said CES expects to see 130,000 attendees.
Alibaba was highlighted as one of the exhibitors using machine learning platforms to “power e-commerce”.
Even much smaller companies are touting their use of AI. Govee, a smart lighting maker from Shenzhen, is advertising the use of generative AI to help people create specific moods, like asking for a backdrop that is evocative of the Hong Kong skyline or Barbie Dreamhouse.
Xpeng is among the major electric vehicle makers at the show, where it will be demonstrating its new “flying car”, the AeroHT.
TikTok and its Beijing-based owner ByteDance have been under intense political scrutiny in Washington over data privacy and national security concerns. This may not have deterred TikTok from showing up to the largest consumer electronics shows in its largest market.
Number of Chinese tech firms at CES 2023 less than half of pre-pandemic level
Representatives from the company will join two panels at the show to discuss sports and entertainment. Beyond entertainment, though, ByteDance makes much of its money through advertising and has been trying to grow its e-commerce business.
Other Chinese companies cannot exhibit at the show even if they want to because they have been listed on Washington’s Entity List. This includes the world’s largest drone maker DJI and a number of semiconductor companies.
“From a show management perspective, we welcome participation from every company,” CTA’s Kelley said. “As a US-based trade association, we cannot allow participation if they are on some sort of Entity List. That’s really the only place where we will not allow participation.”
Still, CES may be more important for the many small firms that make up the bulk of the show’s exhibition floor. It remains the premier event of its kind.
“We like to make the case that the four days you spend in Las Vegas is some of the most efficient use of your time in the sense that you don’t have to necessarily travel the world to meet with individual business partners on six different continents,” said Kelley. “Instead, you can come to Las Vegas and meet everybody that you need to meet from the global technology industry over the course of a week.”

Shenzhen Pango Medical Electronics Co.,LTD
Established in 2000, Shenzhen Pango Medical Electronics Co.,LTD is specialized in developing and manufacturing medical and health-care products such as Electronic Blood Pressure Monitor, Infrared Thermometer, Neck therapy Instrument and other body massager.
To meet growing demand of customers and markets around the world, Pango adopts the latest technology and constantly launches patented medical and health-care products into the market. As a leading developer and manufacturer of home health products in China, we not only have an experienced R&D center, but also a strong production capability. Our integrated production chain includes molding, plastic injection, oil spraying, silk screen printing, SMT workshop and assembly line.
Due to our strict quality management system, advanced technology and perfect processes, Pango passed the ISO13485:2016 international quality management system and our products have been approved by CE, ROHS, CE0413 of Europe ,FDA of USA. We are popular in North America, Europe, South-East Asia, Australia and the Middle East, and hope to expand our market even further.
Our mission is to improve the quality of human health through hi-tech health products. We sincerely welcome all friends from home and abroad and hope to establish long-term and mutually beneficial business relationships. OEM & ODM orders are especially welcomed.

results.title: Company - Shenzhen Pango Medical Electronics Co., Ltd
results.content: Established in 2000, Shenzhen Pango Medical Electronics Co., Ltd. is specialized in developing and manufacturing home health-care products, such as neck massager, eye massager, waist massager, scalp massager, knee massager and body massager. ... Our mission is to improve the quality of human health through hi-tech health products. Pango ...
results.raw_content:
Shenzhen Pango Medical Electronics Co., Ltd
About Pango
Established in 2000, Shenzhen Pango Medical Electronics Co., Ltd. is specialized in developing and manufacturing home health-care products, such as neck massager, eye massager, waist massager, scalp massager, knee massager and body massager.
Our Factory
To meet growing demand of customers and markets around the world, Pango adopts the latest technology and constantly launches patented medical products into the market. As a leading developer and manufacturer of home health products in China, we not only have an experienced R&D center, but also a strong production capability. Our integrated production chain includes molding, plastic injection, oil spraying, silk screen printing, SMT workshop and assembly line.
Our Certificates
Due to our strict quality management system, advanced technology and perfect processes, Pango passed the ISO13485:2016 international quality management system and our products have been approved by ESH,BSH,CE,ROHS, CE0413 of Europe,CE0197 of Europe, FDA of USA. Pango is popular in North America, Europe, South-East Asia, Australia and Middle East, and hope to expand our market even further.
OEM Service
We can do OEM orders according to your requirements.
1) Free for printing 1 color 1 position LOGO if order quantities above 3000pcs.
2) If order above 3000pcs, changing box design is free, if not,US$300 will be charged for color box design and printing.
Quality Guarantee:
1. As we are factory, we can guarantee our price is first-hand, very cheap and competitive.
2. To make sure customer buy good quality material and service from us. Before customer place order, welcome to visit our factory for approve. Before shipment, our QC staff will check quality one by one.
Our Mission
Our mission is to improve the quality of human health through hi-tech health products. Pango sincerely welcome all friends from home and abroad, and hope to establish long-term and mutually beneficial business relationships. OEM & ODM orders are welcomed.
